channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pizza boxes and food litter, 9th July
item.description:
Pavement by the bollards, left of the red phone booth, outside 1-10 Hanover Gate Mansions

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Road, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bring back mixed recycling bin, 9th July
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: basically this is not a complaint because I have found the Waste Collection in general to be extremely good - hence my disappointment when the re -cycling bin for tins and glass disappeared from outside the Refuse site in Southlands Road (opp the Allotments) and has been replaced with all Paper and Cardboard Waste bins!!!! I appreciate that it must be an extremely hard job to keep these areas acceptable, when it is open to Public use, but I am a regular user of these bins and find them extremely helpful. Is this bin going to be replaced ???? • What action (if any) would you like us to take? • Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: basically this is not a complaint because I have found the Waste Collection in general to be extremely good - hence my disappointment when the re -cycling bin for tins and glass disappeared from outside the Refuse site in Southlands Road (opp the Allotments) and has been replaced with all Paper and Cardboard Waste bins!!!! I appreciate that it must be an extremely hard job to keep these areas acceptable, when it is open to Public use, but I am a regular user of these bins and find them extremely helpful. Is this bin going to be replaced ???? • What action (if any) would you like us to take? Bring the bin back
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Baths Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside john brent house, 9th July
item.description:

item.title: Double manhole just near Regents' Park Barracks Bus Stop (on corner of Albany Street and Park Village West, NW1 4AE), 9th July
item.description:
This double pothole is loose and makes a very LOUD noise each and every time a vehicle goes over it. The sound is consistent, LOUD, and there is NO relief from it. It's almost directly outside our property and we cannot hear anything other than this rattling double pothole cover that is loose and loud.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 197, Albany Street, Chalk Farm, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti in children’s playground, 9th July
item.description:

item.title: Terrible sewer smell., 9th July
item.description:
The smell from the sewer is very bad. I have lived in this road for over twenty years and have never experienced anything like this. There is obviously a problem but I’m unable to see where it is. There seems to be a drain between Stowe House and Sandbrook
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Galsworthy Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
